text:
Question:

If we have membership on 2 different subdomains do they share the authentication cookie and have the same login?
Also, for the private content settings, is it possible to set the "logo" at the domain level also?
they will have the same login, but they will have to login separately to each domain
you can set the logo separately for each domain in settings under Website > Pages > Branding

Awesome. Thanks 

Duh on the second part... embarrassed I even asked that :joy:
